description: Try our easy to follow Goats' Cheese & Butternut Squash Stuffed Peppers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Goats' Cheese & Butternut Squash Stuffed Peppers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red capsicum, halved, cored and deseeded
175g butternut squash, peeled, deseeded and cut into small chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a large frying pan, add the peppers, cut side down, and cook for 2 minutes, then turn the peppers over and cook for a further 2 minutes. Remove from the pan.

Meanwhile, heat the remaining oil in a separate frying pan, add the squash and onion and cook for 5 minutes until slightly softened. Remove from the pan and toss with the tapenade in a bowl, then add the goats' cheese and gently toss together.
Spoon the mixture into the pepper halves, then place the peppers in a roasting tin and scatter with the breadcrumbs and Parmesan.
Place in a preheated oven, 200°C, Gas Mark 6, for 15 minutes until the tops are golden and cooked through. Serve hot with a simple salad and crusty bread, if liked.
